comprehensive_overview: BerkeleyGW is a software package for calculating the quasiparticle and optical properties of materials using the GW and Bethe-Salpeter equation (BSE) techniques in many-body perturbation theory. It is widely used in computational materials science for electronic structure calculations.
core_features: Calculates quasiparticle and optical properties of materials
Applies GW and BSE techniques in many-body perturbation theory
